tasks.description:
Dear Legal,
A new customer has been signed!
Could you help us out filling in the fields under the section "Use of Customer logo, name, other customer information (Legal; IP)"? Also note the Approved Bynder Wizard Consent Form checkbox.
Thanks.
tasks.subject: Please set the IPR usage for this new customer
